backend/main.mo: Defines data types and in-memory stores for documents, model stats, gender/geo distributions, purchase intention, and cleaning logs, with APIs to add/reset data and retrieve logs.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of many frontend files, summarizing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark mode using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML bootstrap file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, layout, theme provider, and mounts all main application pages.
frontend/src/components/BrandEmotionChar: Builds a Recharts stacked bar chart showing emotion distribution per brand using mock analysis and visualization state handling.
frontend/src/components/CleaningLogPanel: Displays the latest cleaning logs with status icons, expandable UI, and loading logic using useGetLatestCleaningLog.
frontend/src/components/ConfusionMatrixC: Renders a validated, color‑scaled confusion matrix with emotion labels and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/DatasetUploadSta: Displays dataset upload progress, success details, or error messages based on upload state.
frontend/src/components/EmotionChart.tsx: Generates a bar chart of emotion frequencies from analyzed documents with fallback empty states.
frontend/src/components/EmotionDistribut: Creates a pie-chart-based emotion distribution with a frequency table and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/EnsembleComparis: Shows a radar comparison of ensemble model metrics, converting values to percentages and validating data.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link with an icon.
frontend/src/components/GenderEmotionCha: Displays a bar chart comparing male and female emotion distribution, handling loading, missing data, and visualization state.
frontend/src/components/GeoEmotionMap.ts: Processes and filters geographic emotion data for Indonesian regions and renders a color‑intensity grid map with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main app header with navigation, theme toggle, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/IntentionBrandCo: Shows a stacked bar chart of purchase intention levels per brand, with fallback when no data is available.
frontend/src/components/IntentionDemogra: Generates mock gender and location demographic breakdowns from intention data and displays them as bar charts.
frontend/src/components/IntentionTrendCh: Builds time‑series trend data grouped by intention level and plots it as multi‑line historical trend chart.
frontend/src/components/MarketingMixRada: Displays an 8‑factor marketing mix radar chart with dataset validation and fallback UI for insufficient data.
frontend/src/components/MarketingRadarCh: Generates a marketing effectiveness radar chart from computed metrics with state handling for missing or incomplete datasets.
frontend/src/components/ModelPerformance: Renders a bar chart comparing model precision, recall, and F1‑score, including percentage conversion and empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/components/PsychoSocialHeat: Builds a psycho‑social heatmap based on UTAUT2 constructs, validating matrix dimensions and handling missing data.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseIntentio: Shows a pie chart of purchase‑intention distribution using fetched data with a simple no‑data fallback.
frontend/src/components/RecentAnalysis.t: Lists the five most recent document analyses using mock emotion analysis with badges and brief content previews.
frontend/src/components/TemporalEvolutio: Renders a line chart showing grouped emotion counts over time periods derived from document content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, uploading, and batch-uploading documents and related analytics via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and print-optimized styles for reports.
frontend/src/lib/datasetIngestion.ts: Implements CSV and JSON dataset parsing with header normalization, validation, and structured row extraction.
frontend/src/lib/marketingMetrics.ts: Computes marketing funnel metric scores from document text and aggregates averages across documents for radar chart usage.
frontend/src/lib/marketingMixMetrics.ts: Calculates 8P Marketing Mix factor scores using keyword heuristics and generates normalized scores for visualization.
frontend/src/lib/mockData.ts: Provides brand detection, mock emotion analysis, and sample Indonesian EV brand data for testing and UI demos.
frontend/src/lib/psychoSocialMetrics.ts: Scores UTAUT2 psycho‑social dimensions and classifies document emotions deterministically for heatmap outputs.
frontend/src/lib/strategicReport.ts: Generates strategic reports by analyzing emotions, brand mentions, psycho‑social scores, and marketing metrics to produce recommendations.
frontend/src/lib/strategicReportLocale.t: Defines bilingual UI labels and templates for strategic reports, supporting English and Indonesian localization.
frontend/src/lib/visualizationState.ts: Provides helpers for determining visualization state, sanitizing numeric data, safe array access, and normalizing emotion labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AnalysisPage.tsx: Implements the emotion analysis interface with document filtering, visualization components, and deletion handling.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Handles text and file uploads, dataset ingestion, and displays high-level analysis widgets and recent results.
frontend/src/pages/MetricsPage.tsx: Shows model and ensemble performance metrics, confusion matrices, and tracks dataset/model changes for updates.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseIntentionPage: Displays purchase intention analytics, stats, and related charts derived from processed documents.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides a settings UI for configuring transformer models, ensemble options, thresholds, and adaptation features, with save functionality via toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/StrategicRecommendati: Generates and displays a strategic recommendation report based on uploaded documents, supporting locale switching, markdown export, printing, and empty/loading states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, container settings, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, high-level goals, architectural notes, known issues, and implemented feature metadata for dashboard visualizations and strategic reporting.
